title: Super Galaxy Kindred Ultimate.
body: I bought the new skin today and first off its amazing! however the ultimate sound and animation makes it much harder to time when the ult is about to end. Rito please update it to make the ultimate more obvious when ending... tytytytyt

replies.body:
Hey Doctor Jekyll - 

Unfortunately, this isn't something we have plans to change. We ran through playtests before SG Kindred went live, and did make adjustments to the timing prior to release. What you're seeing on live is what we believe is readable in terms of gameplay. 

The center of the ultimate will light up right before the ultimate is about to end. The particles on the outer ring also become more aggressive.
